title: WildFly 33.0.1 is released!
content: WildFly 33.0.1.Final is now available .  It’s been about four weeks since the WildFly 33 release, so we’ve done a small bug fix update, WildFly 33.0.1. This includes an update to WildFly Preview.  The following issues were resolved in 33.0.1:   BUGS   * [] - OIDCSecurityContext deserialization issue   * [] - Undertow ServerAdd could not detect referenced capabilities   * [] - Deployment-related undertow metrics are not exported   * [] - @PostConstruct on Servlet may be called twice   * [] - Performance regression with HttpSession.getAttribute   COMPONENT UPGRADES   * [] - Upgrade Arquillian 1.9.1.Final, Arquillian Jakarta to 10.0.0.Final and    WildFly Arquillian to 5.1.0.Beta4   * [] - Upgrade CXF to 4.0.5   * [] - Upgrade RESTEasy to 6.2.10.Final   * [] - Upgrade OpenSAML to 4.3.0   * [] - Upgrade WildFly Core to 25.0.1.Final   * [] - Upgrade jboss-ejb-client to 5.0.7.Final   * [] - Upgrade RESTEasy to 7.0.0.Alpha3 in WildFly Preview  Issues resolved in the WildFly Core update included with WildFly 33.0.1 were:   BUGS   * [] - java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: java.util.logging.Logger from Module    "org.bouncycastle.bcpg"   COMPONENT UPGRADES   * [] - Upgrade WildFly Elytron to 2.5.1.Final  Enjoy!
